article_title: Speaker Paul Ryan Should Intervene Right Now In Risk Corridor Class Action

article_metadata.description: A class action lawsuit brought by a failed health insurer in Oregon against the United States over a federal program called "Risk Corridors" has serious implications for the doctrine of separation of powers that has been a crucial part of our constitutional Republic. If differing views on separation of powers [...]
article_metadata.author: The Apothecary
